Sentencas: In this contribution brownmillerite-based nanocomposite cathode for Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells is developed.
Titulo: Single chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells selective electrodes: A real chance with brownmillerite-based nanocomposites

Sentencas: These cells can be very attractive especially for small and cheap devices because of the absence of seals.
Titulo: Single chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells selective electrodes: A real chance with brownmillerite-based nanocomposites

Sentencas: The efficiency of SC-SOFCs is strictly connected to the selectivity of anode and cathode, the bottleneck for this technology.
Titulo: Single chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells selective electrodes: A real chance with brownmillerite-based nanocomposites

Sentencas: The development of a cathode inert in fuel oxidation is particularly challenging.
Titulo: Single chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells selective electrodes: A real chance with brownmillerite-based nanocomposites

Sentencas: Our strategy is to start from a catalytically un-active support (CFA = Ca2FeAl0.95Mg0.05O5) and induce the formation of iron oxide based nanoparticles, expected to activate oxygen.
Titulo: Single chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells selective electrodes: A real chance with brownmillerite-based nanocomposites

Sentencas: Symmetric (CFA thorn FeOx/CGO/CFA + FeOx) and complete cells (CFA + FeOx/CGO/Ni-CGO) are studied in air and methane/oxygen 2:1 mixture.
Titulo: Single chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells selective electrodes: A real chance with brownmillerite-based nanocomposites

Sentencas: The Area Specific Resistance of CFA + FeOx is less than 1/3 that of CFA.
Titulo: Single chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells selective electrodes: A real chance with brownmillerite-based nanocomposites

Sentencas: The high selectivity allows to reach an efficiency of 25%; power still needs to be increased but we demonstrated the possibility to develop selective low cost electrodes.
Titulo: Single chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells selective electrodes: A real chance with brownmillerite-based nanocomposites

Sentencas: The effect of air, methane/oxygen exposure and the heat treatments were carefully investigated.
Titulo: Single chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells selective electrodes: A real chance with brownmillerite-based nanocomposites
